modmenu.descriptionTranslation.openmcski: Mod that's allows to use own skins and capes. Config placed in .minecraft/config/openmcskins.yml
openmcskins.reloadConfig:
Reload OpenMCSkins config and 
all players skins from available hosts
openmcskins.config.title: OpenMCSkins configuration
openmcskins.config.hashingFunction.toolt:
Algorithm that generates a skin name
 SHA384 (RECOMMENDED) - generates a unique name
  for each skin file, but they are long
 SHA1 - deprecated but used in vanilla Minecraft
 CRC32 (not a hashing algorithm) - generates short 
  filenames, but collisions are possible
